name: The Life of a Viking
description:
This game is a demo done as a part of an experiment for the Final Project of the Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering about Control Systems in Virtual Reality videogames done by Sergi Olives in the Pompeu Fabra University.

This is an Android build developed for Oculus Quest 2 HMD that can be downloaded to play.

The source code can be found in the following link: https://github.com/MrAceitun0/VirtualRealityThesis

Note: this is not a finished game and it is best played when the developer gives instructions on how to play, there is a lack of information in-game. The demo has been uploaded in order to have access to it, but the most interesting part of it is the source code, available for anyone interested in the github link. The whole experiment consists in a series of questions and questionnaires that are not included in the game.

Controls:

  • Pick up or Release objects: Hand.Trigger
  • Teleportation: Index.Trigger
  • Activate walk-in-place: press Button.One of each controller and move hands
  • Free locomotion: left joystick
  • Snapping: right joystick
  • Reset scene: Select button
